This diagram depicts the store-and-forward switching process and the validation of C R C.

The diagram depicts a switch connected to three hosts and a server. Two of the hosts are labeled Source and Destination.

The Source host sends a frame to the Destination host. The switch thinks, I am recalculating the C R C value.

Incoming frame C R C value: 435869123
Recalculated C R C value: 435869123
These values are identical.

The switch says, The C R C value is correct. I will forward the frame. The frame is forwarded to the Destination host.
